metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13334 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In GitLab versions prior to 13.2.10, 13.3.7 and 13.4.2, improperauthorization checks allow a non-member of a project/group to change theconfidentiality attribute of issue via mutation GraphQL query

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
